title: ngTMDD v1.0 JSON schema
description: This is JSON schema for Next Generation Traffic Management Data Dictionary (ngTMDD) proposed User Comment Draft (pUCD) standard for the Center to Center (C2C) communications.

AreaLocation.description: Optional requirements for event location information when area location is used

areaIdentifier.description: Provide unique identifier of the defined area in event location information

nameArea.description: Provide the name of the area assigned by the owner organization as part of the event location information.

areaLocationRank.description: Provide the location rank of the area assigned by the owner organization as part of the event location information.

secondaryAreaLocationReference.description: Provide secondary identifier for event location information

ClimateRecordInformation.description: Include climate record metadata information in ESS metadata sent to external center if available

minObservedValue.description: Minimum observed value for this observation type for the month

maxObservedValue.description: Maximum observed value for this observation type this month

month.description: Month to which the climate record applies

CollectorConfigurationContent.description: Requirements for an owner center to send collector configuration metadata information to an external center

headerIndex.description: Index indicating the order of observation type in collected observations

columnLabel.description: Column label name for collected observation data

collectionUnitType.description: Type of collection units used by the collector

scaleFactor.description: Unit's multiplier or scale factor for adjusting decimal position of observations

observationType.description: Provide the observation type being collected as part of the collector configuration information

nullValue.description: Indicate the value for error or missing value in collector configuration information

DataCollectorInformation.description: Include requirements for data collector and image information in ESS metadata sent to external center

stationInstallationDate.description: URL for access to CCTV images associated with the sensor

collectorModelNumber.description: Model number or software version of the collector

DateTime.$comment: json-schema spec describes date-time format as: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ in UTC time. For example, 2025-03-31T11:00:00Z

Detour.description: Send detour type information as part of event description

DeviceChangeCancellationRequest.description: Requirements for device change cancellation request from external center to owner center

deviceType.description: Type of device, such as CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, gate, lane control signal, ramp meter, signal controller, or signal section.

requestId.description: Unique sequence number identifying the control request to be canceled within the requesting center.

operatorId.description: Requirements for the operator identifier making device change cancellation request

DeviceChangeRequestHeader.description: Contents of device change requests from external centers to owner centers

deviceType.description: Type of device such as CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, gate, lane control signal, ramp meter, signal controller, or signal section.

requestId.description: Unique sequence number identifying the control request

requestPriority.description: Provide priority level for device change request where 1 = Lowest Priority, 10 = Highest Priority, Default = 0 (not queued).

operatorId.description: Requirements for operator identifier in device change request

eventId.description: Provide unique identifier of the event for device change request

changeRequestStartDateTime.description: Provide the date and time for the device change request

changeRequestExpirationDateTime.description: Provide expiration date and time for the device change request

changeRequestDateTimeInformation.description: Provide the current date and time in the device change request

DeviceChangeResponseHeader.description: Requirements for owner center response to device change request from external center

deviceType.description: Type of device (e.g., CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, gate, lane control signal, ramp meter, signal controller, signal section)

requestId.description: Unique sequence number identifying the control request

requestStatus.description: Status of the request including completed, received, various rejection reasons, cancelled, or unknown.

operatorId.description: Requirements for operator identifier during device change request acknowledgment

operatorLockId.description: Provide unique identifier of the owner operator who locked the device in the device change request response.

operatorLastRevisedDeviceStatus.description: Provide the date and time of the last status revision in the device change request response

DeviceChangeStatusRequest.description: Include device change status request details from external center to owner center

deviceType.description: Type of device including CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, gate, lane control signal, ramp meter, signal controller, and signal section.

requestId.description: Unique sequence number for identifying the control request

deviceIds.description: Include a list of unique identifiers for devices in the device information request

roadwayNetworkIds.description: Include a list of unique identifiers for roadway networks in the device information request

linkIds.description: Include a list of unique identifiers for links in the device information request

routeDesignators.description: Include a list of route designators in the device information request

linearReferenceFilter.description: Include a range between two linear reference locations in the device information request

sectionIds.description: Include a list of unique identifiers for sections in the device information request

centerIds.description: Include a list of unique identifiers for centers in the device information request

timeRangeFilter.description: Include a valid time period in the device information request

DeviceInformationRequest.description: Requirements for the Device Information Request from an external center to an owner center.

deviceType.description: Identification of various device types such as detector, CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, environmental sensor station, gate, lane control signal, ramp meter, signal controller, and signal section.

deviceInformationType.description: Types of device information including inventory, status, schedule, plan, maintenance history, data, metadata, message appearance, font table, and graphic table.

requestHeader.description: Requirements for authorization information in device information requests

operatorId.description: Requirements for the operator identifier in device information requests

DeviceInformationTypes.description: Types of device information including inventory, status, schedule, plan, maintenance history, data, metadata, message appearance, font table, and graphic table.

DeviceInventoryResponseHeader.description: Requirements for owner center response header to external center request for device information

DeviceOperationalModes.description: Requested operational mode for device (dark, restInGreen, fixedRate, trafficResponsive, emergencyGreen, holdMeter, holdnonMeter, holdRestInGreen).

DevicePriorityQueueRequest.description: Requirements for an external center's request to view the device request queue

deviceType.description: Device type for each priority queue including CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, gate, ramp meter, signal controller, signal section

requestingOrganizationId.description: Unique identifier for the requesting organization

requestHeader.description: Requirements for authorization information in device priority queue request

DeviceScheduleInformation.description: Include unique identifier of each device in the device schedule information

ownerOrganization.description: Unique identifier for the owner organization

DeviceStatusHeader.description: Requirements for exchanging device status information between centers

deviceStatuses.description: Types of devices including detector, detector station, CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, environmental sensor station, gate, lane control signal, ramp meter, signal controller, and signal section.

enum: the receiving center does not support processing of the sending centers message
the message from the sending center is incomplete or information is missing that prevents the message from being processed
message is not well formed or cannot be parsed
message is not valid - out of range values
authorization permission not granted for this request
message is valid but no valid data is available

ErrorReport.description: Report errors in messages received from a sending center

uniqueErrorIdentifier.description: Unique error identifier for processing issues in message transmission

restrictions.description: Provide restrictions on dissemination of information in error report to external center

evaluationCycleId.description: Unique identifier for the evaluation cycle

startTime.description: Start time for the evaluation process

linkState.description: Include link state information in the evaluation cycle content sent from an owner center to an external center

planList.description: Include a list of active response plans in the evaluation cycle content

EventAccessLevels.description: Include event access level information in event element details sent to an external center

EventComments.description: Include event comments information in the event information sent to an external center

commentText.description: Additional internal notes for roadway event description, not to be shared publicly

EventDescription.description: Include event description information in the event details sent from owner center to external center

eventPhrase.description: Information related to various traffic and environmental events, including conditions, incidents, closures, and weather.

eventCause.description: Information related to various event causes impacting traffic conditions

eventAdvice.description: Event advice including suggestions, warnings, recommendations, mandatory instructions, and alternate route guidance.

eventQualifer.description: Identifiers for various event qualifiers related to incidents, including location, lane, vehicle, traveler and responder groups, equipment, transit locations, and response status.

additionalEventDescription.description: Additional text to complement the event description

qualifierTime.description: Time qualifier for data or information

EventDescriptionConfidenceLevels.description: Include event description confidence level information in event element details
enum: detailed official reports covering whole area

EventElementDetails.description: Requirements for the contents of the event element details information sent to an external center, with multiple instances possible; optional if the message closes an open event.

eventName.description: Provide short description of the event

eventLane.description: Provide lane number for the event

EventHazardousMaterialCode.description: Send hazardous material information as part of event details if applicable

eventHazmatCode.description: Provide identification of observed hazardous material using CFR Title 49 codes for accidents and incidents

eventHazmatPlacardCode.description: Provide identification of observed hazardous material using placard codes for accidents and incidents.

EventIndicator.description: Include event indicator information in the event information sent to an external center

eventStatus.description: Provide incident status as part of the event indicator information with supported values.

eventDurationExceededFlag.description: Indicate when event duration or expected end date/time is exceeded as part of event indicator information

eventImpactLevel.description: Provide the impact of an event on the roadway as part of the event indicator information, using a scale from 1 to 10.

eventActiveFlag.description: Indicate if the event represents an active schedule in the event indicator information

eventClass.description: Provide event class as part of event indicator information for planned events

EventLane.description: Include event lane information in event details sent from owner center to external center

laneType.description: Provide the type of lane as part of the event lane information

directionTravel.description: Provide direction of travel on the link as part of event lane information

totalNumberLanes.description: Provide total number of lanes at the event location as part of event lane information

lanesAffected.description: Provide the total number of lanes affected by the event as part of the event lane information.

laneNumberAffected.description: Provide lane number for each lane affected by the event in event lane information

laneStatus.description: Describe the status of the lane affected by the event in event lane information

EventLocation.description: Include event location information in event element details; multiple instances may be sent.

geoLocation.description: Coordinates of the geographic location (longitude and latitude)

EventMessageHeader.description: Requirements for event message header information from owner center to external center.

organization.description: Organization information of the event originator

eventMsgTypeVersion.description: Version of the event message type

eventMsgNum.description: Unique identifier for the event message

messageSentAt.description: Date and time the message was sent

requestingOrganization.description: Provide organization information in the event message header

msgExpiryTime.description: Provide the date and time for message invalidation in the event message header

EventQuantity.description: Describe event quantity information sent from owner center to external center

extent.description: Specify extent affecting length, proportion, and altitude

linkState.description: Link state attributes including delay, peak-delay, alternate route delay, detour-peak-delay, headway, travel time, existing capacity, travel time increase, average speed, estimated vehicle speed, description time, density, occupancy, and volume.

linkLaneState.description: States of Link Lane (open, closed, shift-left, shift-right, merge-left, merge-right, alternating-flow)

incidentDetails.description: Details of incident including count of vehicles, cars, trucks, buses, human fatalities, injuries, major injuries, and minor injuries.

roadWeather.description: Information on road weather conditions including wind direction, wind speed, air temperature, dew point temperature, humidity, atmospheric pressure, precipitation rates, snowfall accumulation, visibility, and UV index.

surfaceConditions.description: Conditions of the surface including water depth, snow depth, ice thickness, temperature, salinity, and friction.

linkRestrictions.description: Regulations related to various vehicle limitations including speed and size restrictions

EventReference.description: Requirements for contents of event reference information sent to an external center

msgUpdatedAt.description: Date and time of message update

EventSource.description: Include event source information in the elements details sent to an external center.

organization.description: Provide information on the organization that is the source of the event information as part of the event source information.

eventDetectionMethod.description: Indicate how the event was detected as part of the event source information

EventTime.description: Include event time information in the event details sent from owner center to external center

eventUpdatedDateTime.description: Include the date and time the event was updated in the event time information

effectivePeriodQualifer.description: Indicate effective period qualifiers as part of the effective period information

eventNotInEffectDays.description: Provide each day of the month a holiday falls on when the event is not in effect as part of effective period information.

plannedEventScheduleElementId.description: Provide event schedule element identifier for planned event category type

sequenceDateTime.description: Provide date and time for each element in the event sequence as part of the event time information.

eventStartDateTime.description: Provide the date and time the event started for current event categories as part of event time information.

expectedStartDateTime.description: Provide expected start date and time for planned event

expectedEndDateTime.description: Provide the expected end date and time for planned events as part of the event time information.

recurrentTimesEventEffect.description: Provide recurrent times for events as part of effective period information

plannedEventContinuousFlag.description: Indicate if the schedule is continuous for planned events between expected start and end date/time

roadwayClearanceTime.description: Provide the date and time the event ended for current event categories

EventValidPeriod.description: Include event valid period information in requests from owner center to external center

expectedEndTime.description: Expected end date and time of the event

eventRemainingDuration.description: Estimated remaining duration of event (minutes) for category 'current', measured from the last update time

effectivePeriod.description: Effective periods indicating valid days of the week for the event.

ExternalDeviceControlCommandResponse.description: Include device type and unique identifier in device control command response

deviceType.description: Type of device (e.g., CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, gate, lane control signal, ramp meter, signal controller)

requestId.description: Unique sequence number identifying the control request from the requesting center

commandStatus.description: Status of the command indicating completion, progress, or various rejection reasons

ExternalDeviceControlRequest.description: Include remote device control command details in external center communication

authorizationHeader.description: Information regarding authorization for external centers

deviceType.description: Type of device (e.g., CCTV camera, dynamic message sign, gate, lane control signal, ramp meter, signal controller)

requestId.description: Unique sequence number identifying the control request

operatorId.description: Requirements for the operator identifier in remote device command requests

LandmarkLocationInformation.description: Include landmark location information in the event location description sent from owner center to external center.

landmarkType.description: Type of location for a landmark

landmarkPointName.description: Provide the name of a point within a landmark as part of event location information

landmarkLocationRank.description: Provide the location rank of the landmark in event location information as assigned by the owner organization.

landmarkLocation.description: Provide geographic location (longitude, latitude) of the landmark as part of event location information.

secondaryLandmarkLocation.description: Provide secondary landmark location as part of event location information

LinkLocation.description: Include a primary Point on a Link Location in event location information

linkOwnership.description: Indicate the name of the organization that owns the link in event location information.

routeDesignator.description: Provide route designator information as part of event location information.

secondRouteDesignator.description: Provide second route designator information as part of event location information

linkIdentifier.description: Provide the unique identifier of the link in the event location information.

linkName.description: Provide the name of the link assigned by the owner organization in the event location information.

linkLane.description: Provide the lane number where the event occurred as part of the event location information.

secondaryPoint.description: Provide secondary point on a link location information as part of the event location information

linkDirection.description: Provide direction of travel on the link as part of event location information

linkAlignment.description: Provide link alignment information as part of event location information with supported values including northbound, eastbound, southbound, westbound, inner loop, and outer loop.

linearReferenceVersionEvents.description: Provide linear reference version information as part of event location information

alternateLinkLocation.description: Provide alternate link location information as part of the event location information

linkRestrictionsHeight.description: The units for the vehicle height restrictions are in centimeters.

linkRestrictionsLength.description: The units for the vehicle length restrictions are in centimeters.

linkRestrictionsWeight.description: The units for the vehicle weight restrictions are in kilograms.

linkRestrictionsWidth.description: The units for the vehicle width restrictions are in centimeters.

linkRestrictionsAxleWeight.description: The units for the vehicle axle weight restrictions are in kilograms.

linkAverageSpeed.description: The units for the speed is in kilometers per hour.

linkEstimatedSpeed.description: The units for the speed is in kilometers per hour.

linkSpeedLimit.description: The units for the speed is in kilometers per hour.

linkCurrentAdvisorySpeed.description: The units for the speed is in kilometers per hour.

linkTruckSpeedLimit.description: The units for the speed is in kilometers per hour.

linkDensity.description: The units for this property is in vehicles per kilometer.

linkVolume.description: The units for this property is in vehicles per hour.

ListCurrentlyFailedSubscriptionsContent.description: Include content of currently filed subscriptions list

dataType.description: Data type included in the update

failureDateTime.description: Date and time of the failure

flag.description: Indicator for receiving or sending status.

subscriptionUpdateSourceEndpoint.description: Send the subscription update source endpoint to the receiving center

ownerCenterSubscriptionRequestEndpoint.description: Send the subscription request endpoint to the receiving center.

subscriptionUpdateTargetEndpoint.description: Send the subscription update target endpoint to the receiving center

OrganizationCenter.description: Provide information about centers owned or operated by the organization in the organization information sent to a receiving center.

organizationCenterId.description: Provide unique identifier of center owned or operated by the organization as part of the organization center information

organizationCenterName.description: Provide the name of the center in organization center information

organizationCenterLocation.description: Indicate geographic location (longitude, latitude) of the sending center in organization center information

organizationCenterDescription.description: Provide a textual description of the center as part of organization center information.

organizationCenterType.description: Indicate if the center is a 'fixed' or 'mobile' center in organization center information

organizationCenterContactInformation.description: Provide unique identifier of the default contact person for the organization center

OrganizationContactInformation.description: Provide default contact person information for the organization

contactGroupId.description: Provide the unique identifier of the default contact person as part of the organization contact information

contactGroupName.description: Provide the name of the contact person for the organization in the information sent to the receiving center

contactGroupRole.description: Provide a description of the contact person's job or role in the organization as part of the organization information

workPhoneNumber.description: Provide the work telephone number of the contact person in organization information

alternatePhoneNumber.description: Provide an alternate phone number for the contact person in organization information

organizationId.description: Include the unique identifier of the organization in the information sent from the sending center to the receiving center.

organizationName.description: Provide organization name in the organization information sent to the receiving center.

organizationLocation.description: Provide the location of the organization in the organization information sent to the receiving center.

orgInformationLastUpdated.description: Provide the date and time of the last change to organization information in the data sent to a receiving center.

OtherReferences.description: Associate one event with another event for comprehensive situational awareness

tripReference.description: Provide trip reference information related to the event in the event information sent to an external center.

responsibleReference.description: Provide event reference information as part of the event information sent to an external center.

relatedEvent.description: Provide event reference information of a related event in the event information sent to an external center.

previousEvent.description: Provide event reference information of a previous event in the event information sent to an external center.

splitEvent.description: Provide event reference information of a split event in event information sent to an external center

mergedEvent.description: Provide event reference information of a merged event in the event information sent to an external center

siblingEvent.description: Provide event reference information of a sibling event in event information sent to an external center.

associatedDevice.description: Provide device reference information related to the event in the event information sent to an external center.

associatedUrl.description: Provide a URL as part of event information sent to an external center for additional event details

PointOnALinkLocation.description: Include geographic location (longitude, latitude) for event location information

linearReferenceLocation.description: Provide linear reference location in event location information

linkNameEventPoint.description: Provide the name of the roadway for event location information

pointName.description: Provide the name of a point along the roadway as part of the event location information.

crossStreetIdentifier.description: Provide unique identifier of each cross street in event location information

crossStreetName.description: Provide unique names of each cross street as part of event location information

signedDestination.description: Provide signed destination information as part of the event location information

pointLocationRank.description: Include location rank from 0 to 10 in event location information, indicating relative importance.

landmarkType.description: Include landmark type information as part of event location information

secondaryLinkLocation.description: Provide secondary link location as part of event location information

message.description: The message payload received or broadcast by the RSU

messageNumber.description: The message number received or broadcast by the RSU

messageType.description: The V2X message type of message received or broadcast by the RSU

messageSource.description: The message source of message received or broadcast by the RSU

activeMessage.description: The active message type of message received or broadcast by the RSU

responsePlanIds.description: Required if 'specific response plans' is selected.

ResponsePlanActivityLogContent.description: Send response plan log details to the external center

deviceType.description: Device type involved in the response plan

deviceId.description: Unique identifier for the device involved in the response plan

commandSent.description: Command sent to the device in the response plan

commandStatus.description: Response plan command status for each sent command

acknowledgement.description: Text of any acknowledgement sent in response to a command

commandSendTime.description: Contain command send time and command acknowledgement received time in the response plan activity log details.

ResponsePlanApprovalDecision.description: Send response approval decision to external center regarding response plan activities

organization.description: Identifier for the organization providing the decision

approvalMethod.description: Indication of the method of approval (automated, manual)

decisionTime.description: Include the time of the approval decision in the response plan approval notification to the external center.

projectedEndTime.description: Estimated time the projected activity will conclude

participatingAgencies.description: List of agencies involved in response plan activities

detourList.description: Send the list of detours as part of the response plan to the external center.

rampMeterActions.description: Send a list of ramp meter control actions included in the response plan to the external center.

intersectionSignalControlActions.description: Send a list of intersection signal control actions in the response plan to the external center

dmsControlActions.description: Send a list of DMS control actions within the response plan to the external center

harMessageControlActions.description: Send a list of HAR message control actions in the response plan to the external center

otherMessages.description: Send a list of informational messages included in the response plan to the external center

lcsScheduleChanges.description: Send a list of LCS schedule cancellations in the response plan to the external center

speedRestrictions.description: Send speed reduction actions included in the response plan to the external center

roadClosureActions.description: Send road closure actions included in the response plan to the external center

personnelDeploymentActions.description: Send a list of personnel deployment actions in the response plan to the external center

deviceControlActions.description: Send a list of device control cancellations within the response plan to the external center

aggregateApprovalDecisions.description: Send aggregate approval decision for response plan to external center

individualApprovalDecisions.description: Send a list of individual approval decisions from all participating agencies to the external center

ResponsePlanFilter.description: Include a response plan filter in the response plan information request based on specified criteria

responsePlanStatuses.description: List of statuses for response plans

ResponsePlanHeader.description: Send the response plan header to an external center

planId.description: Unique identifier for the response plan

responsePlanRanking.description: Include a ranking of the response plan in the response plan header

submissionTime.description: Include submission time of response plan for approval in the header

Restrictions.description: Provide restrictions on information dissemination in the response message to external centers

SensorSpecificInformation.description: Requirements for sensor specific metadata information that may be included in ESS metadata information

stationId.description: Unique identifier for the ESS station

essSensorId.description: Unique identifier for the ESS sensor

observationType.description: Type of observation collected by the sensor based on NTCIP 1204 types

manufacturerModelNumber.description: Manufacturer's model number for the sensor

sensorDescription.description: Provide a description of the sensor as part of sensor-specific metadata information

minimumValueSensorRange.description: Provide the minimum value of the sensor range if different from manufacturer specifications as part of sensor metadata

maximumValueSensorRange.description: Provide maximum value of sensor range if different from manufacturer's specifications as part of sensor metadata.

maximumPositiveRateChange.description: Provide the maximum positive rate of change during the defined rate interval as part of the sensor specific metadata

maximumNegativeRateChange.description: Provide maximum negative rate of change as part of sensor specific metadata information

rateInterval.description: Provide the rate interval (in seconds) for maximum rates in sensor metadata if a custom value is desired.

persistenceInterval.description: Provide the duration in seconds for which observed values can remain constant in sensor metadata information

persistenceThreshold.description: Provide the smallest amount of change allowed between observations for custom value in sensor metadata

likeInstrumentThreshold.description: Provide the largest observed difference permitted among like instruments as part of sensor specific metadata information if a custom value is desired.

dateCalibration.description: Provide the last date the sensor was calibrated in sensor metadata information

dateLastMaintenance.description: Provide the last date maintenance was performed on the sensor as part of sensor specific metadata information

serialNumber.description: Provide the manufacturer's serial number for the sensor in the sensor specific metadata information

sensorResolution.description: Provide smallest increment or measurement from the sensor in metadata information

sensorAccuracy.description: Provide known potential variation of observation (accuracy) for the sensor in sensor-specific metadata information

minimumValueOutput.description: Provide the minimum sensor output value in the sensor metadata information

maximumValueOutput.description: Provide the maximum sensor output value in sensor specific metadata information

sensorStationNorthSouthOffset.description: Provide north/south distance in meters of the sensor from the station reference location in sensor specific metadata

sensorStationEastWestOffset.description: Provide east/west distance of the sensor from the station reference location in meters as part of sensor metadata

sensorStationElevationOffset.description: Provide the vertical distance of the sensor from the station reference location in the sensor specific metadata information

sensorSurfaceOffset.description: Provide vertical distance from pavement surface as part of the sensor specific metadata information

embeddedMaterialDescription.description: Provide a description of the material of the embedded sensor in sensor metadata information

outputAverageInterval.description: Provide average interval in milliseconds for sensor observations as part of sensor specific metadata information

outputInternalUnits.description: Provide internal units of measurement reported by the sensor in the metadata information sent to an external center

initialInstallationDateEssSensor.description: Provide the installation date of the sensor as part of the sensor metadata information

beginDatetimeOutServicePeriod.description: Provide date and time the sensor was taken out of service as part of the sensor metadata information

endDatetimeOutServicePeriod.description: Provide the date and time the sensor was put back into service as part of the sensor metadata information

samplingInterval.description: Provide interval time in seconds between consecutive sensor readings in sensor specific metadata information

SiteSpecificInformation.description: Requirements for site specific metadata information that may be included in ESS metadata sent to an external center.

siteSpecificMetadataInformation.description: Include a description of the site in ESS metadata information sent to an external center.

roadwayName.description: Provide the name or number of the nearest highway as part of site-specific metadata information

linearReferenceEssMetadata.description: Provide linear reference location and version information in site-specific metadata for external center

linearReferenceUnits.description: Provide units reported for the roadway marker as part of site-specific metadata information

distanceRoadway.description: Provide distance in meters from the closest point on the roadway surface to the site reference point as part of site-specific metadata.

elevationRoadway.description: Provide the difference in elevation between the center surface of the roadway and the site reference point in site-specific metadata information.

jurisdiction.description: Provide the county or jurisdictional name of the site location in the site-specific metadata information

state.description: Provide the state (2 letter postal ID) as part of site-specific metadata information

country.description: Provide the country the site is located in as part of the site-specific metadata information

accessDirections.description: Provide directions to access the site from a major roadway in site-specific metadata information

siteRepresentativeness.description: Provide description of unique meteorological or topographical features as part of site-specific metadata

siteObstructions.description: Provide description of physical properties affecting observation accuracy in site-specific metadata

siteLandscape.description: Provide description of the landscape surrounding the site as part of site-specific metadata

siteAccessControl.description: Indicate if access to the site is controlled in site-specific metadata information

siteSlope.description: Provide the grade of the landscape surrounding the site as part of the site-specific metadata information

siteGradeDirection.description: Provide the direction of the landscape grade in degrees from North as part of site-specific metadata.

siteWindRoughness.description: Provide roughness of the wind in four directions as part of site-specific metadata

siteSoilType.description: Provide type of soil as part of site-specific metadata information

uniqueSiteIdentifier.description: Provide unique identifier of the site as part of site-specific metadata information

StationSpecificInformation.description: Requirements for station specific metadata information in ESS metadata

stationCategory.description: Category of the station (permanent, transportable, mobile, other)

stationId.description: Unique identifier for the station assigned by the owner organization

geoLocation.description: Geographic coordinates of the station (longitude and latitude)

stationElevation.description: Elevation of the station base from mean sea level (meters)

stationDescription.description: Provide a description of the station in station specific metadata information

stationOperationType.description: Provide operation type of the station in station specific metadata information

stationGeoCordinateReferencingModel.description: Provide the datum geocoordinate referencing model as part of station specific metadata information.

stationPowerSource.description: Indicate the power source for the station as part of the station specific metadata information.

doorStatus.description: Indicate if any doors attached to the station are open in the station specific metadata

batteryStatus.description: Provide battery percentage as part of station specific metadata information

lineVolts.description: Provide typical voltage for the power source in station specific metadata information

stationMaintenanceGroupName.description: Provide a description of the maintenance group for the station in the station specific metadata information.

preventiveMaintenanceInterval.description: Provide preventive maintenance frequency in days for the station as part of station specific metadata

maintenanceCalibrationInterval.description: Provide calibration maintenance frequency description for the station in metadata information

maintenanceStatus.description: Indicate the maintenance status of the station in station specific metadata information

initialInstallationDate.description: Provide the date the station was initially installed as part of the station specific metadata information

numberDevices.description: Provide number of sensor interface devices supported by the station in station specific metadata information

communicationsMethod.description: Provide method of communications to the station in station-specific metadata

stationPhoneNumber.description: Provide telephone number for station contact in station specific metadata

stationIpAddress.description: Provide IP address of the station in station specific metadata information

stationManufacturer.description: Provide manufacturer information as part of station specific metadata for external center

observationCollectionInterval.description: Provide frequency in minutes between collection cycles in station specific metadata information

observationCollectionOffset.description: Provide the number of minutes after UTC midnight for the first collection in station specific metadata

transmissionInterval.description: Provide transmission cycle frequency in minutes as part of station specific metadata information

transmissionOffset.description: Provide the number of minutes after UTC midnight for the first transmission in station specific metadata

transmissionFormat.description: Provide description of the transmission format from station to network data logger in station specific metadata information

stationMaintenanceContactInformation.description: Provide the unique identifier of the default contact person as part of station specific metadata information.

TrafficNetworkInformationRequest.description: Send a traffic network information request to the owner center

networkInformationType.description: Type of network information requested (inventory, status, data)

requestHeader.description: Optional requirements for authorization information in traffic network information requests
